name: Empty World (mexerica)
description:
Commands

- Arrows to move

- Z to select

- X to change the background color

Rules

- You can work to earn money, but when you work you lose energy, you get thirsty, you miss a few days and you get irritated.

- You can sleep to recover energy and humor, but loses  a day

- You can drink water to hydrate

- You can drink coffee to recover energy or beer to recover the mood without missing a day, but you can't overdo it.

-  You can double your gains

- You can buy itens to decorate the environment and give you advantages

Status

- I think about putting more decorations
